Uses of Interface
org.joml.Matrix3dc

  • Packages that use Matrix3dc 
    Package Description
    org.joml
    Contains all classes of JOML.

    • Uses of Matrix3dc in org.joml

      Classes in org.joml that implement Matrix3dc 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Matrix3d
      Contains the definition of a 3x3 matrix of doubles, and associated functions to transform it.
      Methods in org.joml that return Matrix3dc 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Matrix3dc Matrix3d.toImmutable()
      Create a new immutable view of this Matrix3d.
      Methods in org.joml with parameters of type Matrix3dc 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Matrix3d Matrix3d.add(Matrix3dc other)
      Component-wise add this and other.
      Matrix3d Matrix3dc.add(Matrix3dc other, Matrix3d dest)
      Component-wise add this and other and store the result in dest.
      Matrix3d Matrix3d.add(Matrix3dc other, Matrix3d dest) 
      Matrix3d Matrix3d.lerp(Matrix3dc other, double t)
      Linearly interpolate this and other using the given interpolation factor t and store the result in this.
      Matrix3d Matrix3dc.lerp(Matrix3dc other, double t, Matrix3d dest)
      Linearly interpolate this and other using the given interpolation factor t and store the result in dest.
      Matrix3d Matrix3d.lerp(Matrix3dc other, double t, Matrix3d dest) 
      Vector3d Vector3d.mul(Matrix3dc mat)
      Multiply the given matrix mat with this Vector3d.
      Matrix3d Matrix3d.mul(Matrix3dc right)
      Multiply this matrix by the supplied matrix.
      Matrix3d Matrix3dc.mul(Matrix3dc right, Matrix3d dest)
      Multiply this matrix by the supplied matrix and store the result in dest.
      Matrix3d Matrix3d.mul(Matrix3dc right, Matrix3d dest) 
      Vector3d Vector3dc.mul(Matrix3dc mat, Vector3d dest)
      Multiply the given matrix mat with this and store the result in dest.
      Vector3d Vector3d.mul(Matrix3dc mat, Vector3d dest)

      Component-wise multiply this by other.

      Vector3d Vector3d.mulTranspose(Matrix3dc mat)
      Multiply the transpose of the given matrix with this Vector3f and store the result in this.
      Vector3d Vector3dc.mulTranspose(Matrix3dc mat, Vector3d dest)
      Multiply the transpose of the given matrix with this Vector3f and store the result in dest.
      Vector3d Vector3d.mulTranspose(Matrix3dc mat, Vector3d dest) 
      Matrix4x3d Matrix4x3d.set(Matrix3dc mat)
      Set the left 3x3 submatrix of this Matrix4x3d to the given Matrix3dc and the rest to identity.
      Matrix4d Matrix4d.set(Matrix3dc mat)
      Set the upper left 3x3 submatrix of this Matrix4d to the given Matrix3dc and the rest to identity.
      Matrix3d Matrix3d.set(Matrix3dc m)
      Set the values in this matrix to the ones in m.
      AxisAngle4f AxisAngle4f.set(Matrix3dc m)
      Set this AxisAngle4f to be equivalent to the rotation of the given Matrix3dc.
      AxisAngle4d AxisAngle4d.set(Matrix3dc m)
      Set this AxisAngle4d to be equivalent to the rotation of the given Matrix3dc.
      Matrix4x3d Matrix4x3d.set3x3(Matrix3dc mat)
      Set the left 3x3 submatrix of this Matrix4x3d to the given Matrix3dc and don't change the other elements.
      Matrix4d Matrix4d.set3x3(Matrix3dc mat)
      Set the upper left 3x3 submatrix of this Matrix4d to the given Matrix3dc and don't change the other elements.
      Quaternionf Quaternionf.setFromNormalized(Matrix3dc mat)
      Set this quaternion to be a representation of the rotational component of the given matrix.
      Quaterniond Quaterniond.setFromNormalized(Matrix3dc mat)
      Set this quaternion to be a representation of the rotational component of the given matrix.
      Quaternionf Quaternionf.setFromUnnormalized(Matrix3dc mat)
      Set this quaternion to be a representation of the rotational component of the given matrix.
      Quaterniond Quaterniond.setFromUnnormalized(Matrix3dc mat)
      Set this quaternion to be a representation of the rotational component of the given matrix.
      Matrix3d Matrix3d.sub(Matrix3dc subtrahend)
      Component-wise subtract subtrahend from this.
      Matrix3d Matrix3dc.sub(Matrix3dc subtrahend, Matrix3d dest)
      Component-wise subtract subtrahend from this and store the result in dest.
      Matrix3d Matrix3d.sub(Matrix3dc subtrahend, Matrix3d dest) 
      Constructors in org.joml with parameters of type Matrix3dc 
      Constructor and Description
      Matrix3d(Matrix3dc mat)
      Create a new Matrix3d and initialize it with the values from the given matrix.
      Matrix4d(Matrix3dc mat)
      Create a new Matrix4d by setting its uppper left 3x3 submatrix to the values of the given Matrix3dc and the rest to identity.
      Matrix4x3d(Matrix3dc mat)
      Create a new Matrix4x3d by setting its left 3x3 submatrix to the values of the given Matrix3dc and the rest to identity.
